underlying_goal: Monitor and debug an auto-generation workflow for a fortune-telling product, fixing bugs discovered in the frontend code
friction_detail: Session data persistence initially appeared broken due to querying the wrong path, and subtitle field name mismatches caused bugs in auto.html.
brief_summary: User monitored a fortune-telling product auto-generation pipeline and Claude identified and fixed field name mismatches and type inconsistency bugs in the frontend code, updating the version history.
